about_the_game:
🔥 Experience Strategy and Excitement with Square Wars! 🔥

🗺️ Are you ready to rule vast territories starting from a single square? ⚔️ Build your strategy, manage your resources wisely, and rise to the top by defeating your enemies! 🌍 Square Wars invites you to a thrilling world where you can play solo or with friends. 🎮

🎮 Single Player, Local Co-op, and Online Multiplayer Modes!

🌟 Conquer alone or challenge your friends on the same screen or online! Square Wars makes strategic battles even more exciting with local co-op and online multiplayer modes. 🏆 Test your tactics against friends, team up to defeat rivals, or fight side by side! 🤝💥

🎯 Game Features and Mechanics:

  • 📈 From a Single Square to an Empire: Every player starts with just one square. Make strategic decisions to expand your territory and grow your borders! Every move brings you one step closer to victory. 🌟

  • 💎 The Art of Resource Collection: From gold mines to stone quarries, everything you need awaits you on the map. Manage your resources wisely to develop your society and dominate your enemies! ⚒️

  • ⚔️ The Thrill of Battles: Attack rival territories and lead your armies to victory! Each battle is a chance to test your strategic intellect and strengthen your power. Conquer your neighbors and expand your borders! 🔥

  • 🃏 Strategic Card Usage: Square Wars offers special cards that can change the flow of the game. Each card gives you a unique advantage to turn the tide of battle. Play the right card at the right time and secure your victory! 🎴

  • 🧠 Tactical Depth: This is not just a war game; Square Wars challenges you to think strategically, make quick decisions, and use your resources efficiently. Surprise your opponents with every move! 🤔

  • 🌍 Random Maps and Endless Opportunities: Every game is a new adventure! Randomly generated maps offer a unique challenge every time. You'll love playing again and again! 🚀

  • 👑 Ultimate Goal: Victory! The goal is simple: Conquer all regions and become the sole ruler of the map. But beware, your rivals are after the same goal! 🏰

💡 Why Play Square Wars?

Square Wars offers a fantastic experience for both seasoned strategy players and newcomers. 🌟 Test your creativity and strategic skills while enjoying hours of fun and competition in every game. Embark on a grand adventure alone or create unforgettable memories by playing with friends! 🎮

🎯 Download now, showcase your strategy, and join the excitement of battle! ⚔️

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12 (Sierra) or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics (Intel HD Graphics 4000 or better)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard audio hardware (built-in)
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Square Wars is a rogue-lite square-conquering game featuring real-time strategy, resource gathering, survival, and card-based gameplay mechanics. 🌍 Randomly generated maps make each game unique. Join the adventure solo, in local co-op with a friend, or online! 🎮🔥
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Dutch, Japanese, Polish, Hungarian, Russian, Turkish, Swedish
